vendor_name: The River House Dambulla by The Serendipity Collection
title: Sri Lanka Luxury Eco Villa Near Dambulla Cave Temple
description: Uncover the culturally rich and vibrant city of Dambulla at The River House Dambulla by The Serendipity Collection, a stunning eco-friendly pavilion located nearby the iconic Dambulla Rock Temple. The building was designed under the renowned environmental architect Sunela Jayawardena on a four-acre plot with over 400 hand-planted trees. While you're here, take a dip in your private pool, practice yoga on the sun deck and enjoy an afternoon nap in the hammock.
